txt.en: 'Tell me: who is the leader of these lands?'
'Why, that would be Gárwig, Reeve of Wildermore....'
'How old is he? Is he strong? Hale?'
'His line is strong, but he is no longer young.'
'Now tell me: what strongholds have you in this land?'
'I thank you for your time and hospitality.'
'Our Reeve has many fine sons! Gárnoth, Gárferth, Edsig, Cúthbald, Gársig....'
'...and there is also Thrymm Red-beard, the hero of Wildermore!'
'I leave you with this gift, so that you may remember your service to an old wanderer.'
'He is like a son to Gárwig. None can best him in battle.'
